[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [SyntheticView](../fast-element.syntheticview/index.html)

## SyntheticView interface

A view representing a range of DOM nodes which can be added/removed ad hoc.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SyntheticView<TSource = any, TParent = any> extends View<TSource, TParent> 
```
**Extends:** [View](../fast-element.view/)<!-- -->&lt;TSource, TParent&gt;

Node


</td><td>

</td><td>

</td><td>

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[insertBefore(node)](../fast-element.syntheticview.insertbefore/)


</td><td>

Inserts the view's DOM nodes before the referenced node.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[remove()](../fast-element.syntheticview.remove/)


</td><td>

Removes the view's DOM nodes. The nodes are not disposed and the view can later be re-inserted.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
